DO NOT DOWNLOAD, the UPDATE that is a MUST to install F***ed up my XBOX360. now it wont recognize any of my other games , stay away from this torrent, this sucks , the UPDATE is NOT SAFE at all, and No I didnt go online with it , it asked to update I clicked yes , it did it thing , it was about to start and then the unrecognized disc msg start to pop , I tried different games which worked earlier and no luck , this 360 is useless now , download at your own risk guys.
@smilingze sometimes new update can override your flash, when it did you need to do it again and that`s it
i mean flash your xbox optical drive again, you can use LT 3.0 from c4eva to get full compatibility with newer games

How do I burn this to disc - 

*My Imgburn layer break is set to Calculate Optimal
*I choose Write until ens of disc (Truncate)
*It then states -
Optimal Layer Break Position Exceeds L0 Capacity
-Optimal L0 Sectors: 2,133,520
-Maximum L0 sectors: 2,086,912
Would You Like To Continue Anyway?
*I choose Yes and get -
Set L0 Data Zone Capacity Failed!
Reason: Invalid Field in Parameter List

Now I ent a NooB n have 'Backed Up' atleast 100 games n this is the 1st time I've encountered this
Burned this succesfully and it loads but after the logos it shows error "there is a problem with the disk...." whys like that?
IMGBurn says is to big to burn???? What do I do?

Thank you, my children love this. I updated xbox online, then flashed it to lt3.0, I ran the iso through the latest abx360,  burnt disk 1 using image burn (truncated, i don't have an ihas), and played from disk, no update showed up for me, and works perfectly.
